body.name: HEPA Air Purifier for Home, Elechomes P1801 Air Cleaner with Auto Mode, Air Quality Sensor, Removes 99.97% Dust Smoke Pet Dander, 22dB Ultra-Quiet, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 33 mins
features: AIR QUALITY REMIND: Advanced sensor monitors the air quality, LED light shows the status of the air quality.

POWERFUL HEPA FILTER: Unique 4-stage filtration is more powerful than other filtration: Pre-filter → filter cloth → HEPA filter → activated carbon filter. H13 HEPA filter remove 99.97% of airborne particles down to 0.3 microns.
QUICK PURIFY: Capable of delivering 141 CFM (240m³/h) of clean air, perfect for home, large room, bedroom, office, kitchen, baby room.
22dB ULTRA-QUIET: Always create a comfortable and fresh indoor environment for your work, sleep and study. Suitable for sound-sensitive people and light sleepers.
FILTER REPLACEMENT INDICATOR- The filter replace indicator will flash red when it's time to change. We recommend replacing it every 6-8 months to ensure the best performance of the air purifier.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Air Quality Indicator Light Adjustable Fan Speed & Timer Filter Replace Remind

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stellar build quaility, from tested electrical efficiency to air filtration
reviews.reviewText: When I decided on buying this air filter, I was knee deep in research finding the best model to use in my bedroom and clean the air in my new, giant house that is especially good at collecting dust and residual VOC's from a bad past. This machine, of which I'm rocking 3 now, has not let me down one bit. The small filter quickly fills with gunk, the air quaility sensor works perfectly, and quite mode is hardly audible(I cannot sleep with light or sound in my room) I love the quite and lights out mode for sleep, and auto with lights everywhere else. Replacement filters could be had for as low as 10 dollars even! The build quaility is something everyone comments on, and its sleek design fits right at home with me. I love the brand now, and their extended warrantee is such a nice touch. I doubt I'll ever need it though:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silent on med
reviews.reviewText: Basically silent, barely white noise on high; I like the auto function but it doesn’t like humidifiers(same brand) apparently

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok but not as powerful as my old model from different manufacturer
reviews.reviewText: Elechomes Air Purifier filters easy to install. machine runs well, a bit noisy on high settings. Blows well and seems to clear odors from the kitchen (open floor plan of about 200 sq ft). If I had not had a more powerful model Air Purifier before this one, I think I would be entirely satisfied with the Elechomes Air Purifier. I will wait a few more months before deciding to replace this KJ200-A3B True HEPA H13.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I bought this at the beginning of the Seattle wildfire smoke out. I also have a pet with allergies that cause his inner eye to build up with boogers. Third, I sometimes enjoy cannabis and don't want my place to stink. This compact and light air purifier knocked out all three problems: wildfire smoke - gone, dust/general air pollution (and eye boogers) - gone, and Mary Jane smoke - very quickly sucked up and deodorized when detected by the air quality monitor. Very highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Replacement filters impossible to find
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this product and loved it! It’s great at adjusting to suit the environment and super quiet. However, after 6 months it came time to replace the filter, and they are impossible to find. Not only are they very hard to find (and expensive), all the ones I’ve found, despite bring an exact replacement DON’T WORK. The filter button constantly goes off, even if I’ve changed it 5 mins prior. All in all, if filter replacements were easier, I’d totally recommend this product as it is very good and easy to use, but it’s not worth considering buying another to get around the filter problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product minimal work needed
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Plug in, pair to wifi if needed, enjoy. Don't forget to clean filter once in a while that's all enjoy good quality. The auto mode does it for yourself. As soon as it sense dust or sometime starts smoking downstairs. She'll turn on lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love it
reviews.reviewText: This the best air purifier I have ever used. The light changes with the air quality. It filters the air in the room really fast. It automatically increases the fan speed when there is a change in the filters the air in the room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Almost impossible to hear unless it has to run at really high speeds. It helps cut down on the dust. But does absolute nothing to eliminate odors.
